ValidationRule.description: If "Type of 401k NSF" is "Billing", then "401k NSF Amount - Billing" and "Billing NSF Alert Date" is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( Type_of_NSF__c , "Billing")&& ( ISBLANK( Outstanding_401_k_NSF_Amount_Billing__c ) || ISBLANK( Outstanding_Billing_NSF_Alert_Date__c ) )&& ( NOT( ISPICKVAL( Switch_to_Participant_Asset_Billing__c , "Yes"))|| NOT( ISPICKVAL( Switch_to_Participant_Asset_Billing__c , "No"))|| NOT( ISPICKVAL( Cancelled_Plan_Due_to_NSF_R_coded__c , "Yes"))|| NOT( ISPICKVAL( Cancelled_Plan_Due_to_NSF_R_coded__c , "No")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If the NSF type is "Billing" you must enter a value in the "401k NSF Amount - Billing" and "Billing NSF Alert Date" fields
